---
name: Geo Query Request
about: Submit a command for geo_query execution
title: "Geo Query Command"
labels: geo_query
assignees: ''

---

```json payload
{
  "mesh1": "brain",
  "mesh2": "\"Colorectal Neoplasms\"",
  "organism": "human",
  "geofetchParams": "--count",
  "geofetchOutput": "human_brain_Colorectal_Neoplasms.csv"
  "geofetchOutputType": "csv"
}
```
